p: Male mice of about the same weight and age (20-25 g and within the age range of 5-8 weeks) were obtained from Pasteur Institute of Iran. In addition, these animals were selected for this project because of their availability, size, low cost, ease of handling, and a powerful application for modeling human diseases (Justice et al., 2011 ▶). They were kept in a room with natural light at about 22 °C (Bekkevold et al., 2013 ▶). Further, all mice had free access to water and chow for 1 week although access was prevented or restricted during the experiment time.
